mapper.sql: id, project_id, content, project_estimate, money_source, approve, examine, create_time, del_flag, operator, operator_id, operator_time, approve_opinion, examine_opinion
mapper.insert: insert into project_plan (id, project_id, content, project_estimate, money_source, approve, examine, create_time, del_flag, operator, operator_id, operator_time, approve_opinion, examine_opinion) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectEstimate,jdbcType=REAL}, #{moneySource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{examine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{approveOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examineOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

project_id,
content,
project_estimate,
money_source,
approve,
examine,

operator,
operator_id,
operator_time,
approve_opinion,

mapper.update:
update project_plan
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_estimate = #{projectEstimate,jdbcType=REAL},
money_source = #{moneySource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approve = #{approve,jdbcType=INTEGER},
examine = #{examine,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_time = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
approve_opinion = #{approveOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
examine_opinion = #{examineOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update project_plan set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_estimate = #{projectEstimate,jdbcType=REAL}, money_source = #{moneySource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approve = #{approve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, examine = #{examine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_time = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, approve_opinion = #{approveOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, examine_opinion = #{examineOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select pp1.*,ps2.project_name from project_plan pp1, project_store ps2
where pp1.del_flag = 0 and pp1.approve = 1 and pp1.project_id = ps2.id
and ps2.project_name like concat('%',#{projectName,jdbcType = VARCHAR},'%') order by ps2.id desc

select pp1.*,ps2.project_name from project_plan pp1, project_store ps2 where pp1.del_flag = 0 and pp1.project_id = ps2.id and constru_unit_id=#{unitId}
and ps2.project_name like concat('%',#{projectName,jdbcType = VARCHAR},'%') order by pp1.id desc
mapper.update:
update project_plan
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_estimate = #{projectEstimate,jdbcType=REAL},
money_source = #{moneySource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approve = #{approve,jdbcType=INTEGER},
examine = #{examine,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_time = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
approve_opinion = #{approveOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
examine_opinion = #{examineOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select pp1.*,ps2.project_name,ps2.planed_flag from project_plan pp1, project_store ps2 where pp1.del_flag = 0 and pp1.project_id = ps2.id and constru_unit_id=#{unitId} and pp1.approve=1 and pp1.examine=1
and ps2.project_name like concat('%',#{projectName,jdbcType = VARCHAR},'%') order by ps2.id desc

select pp1.*,ps2.project_name,ps2.planed_flag from project_plan pp1, project_store ps2,feasibility_research_report frr where pp1.del_flag = 0 and pp1.project_id = ps2.id and constru_unit_id=constru_unit_id=#{unitId} and pp1.approve=1 and pp1.examine=1 and frr.project_id=ps2.id and frr.approve=1 and frr.examine=1

select pp1.*,ps2.project_name,ps2.planed_flag,pr.approve as pr_approve,pr.examine as pr_examine from project_plan pp1, project_store ps2,predesign_report pr where pp1.del_flag = 0 and pp1.project_id = ps2.id and constru_unit_id=#{unitId} and pp1.approve=1 and pp1.examine=1 and pp1.project_id = pr.project_id

select pp1.*,ps2.project_name,ps2.planed_flag,pr.approve as pr_approve,pr.examine as pr_examine from project_plan pp1, project_store ps2,predesign_report pr where pp1.del_flag = 0 and pp1.project_id = ps2.id and pp1.approve=1 and pp1.examine=1 and pp1.project_id = pr.project_id and pr.approve=1 order by pr.examine
select * from project_plan where project_id = #{projectId} and del_flag = 0
